sentences.en: So a very very quick summary of his epistemological approach.
sentences.cn: 那便是他对认识论的简要概括。

sentences.en: Epistemological: Why should we believe in climate change?
sentences.cn: 认识层面：为什么我们要觉得气候变化了？ 证据呢？

sentences.en: This view, however, furnishes no solution for the epistemological problem.
sentences.cn: 这种观点，但是，提供了没有解决认识论的问题。
